verses.roman:
sārvabhauma kahe,--nīlāmbara cakravartī
viśāradera samādhyāyī,--ei tāṅra khyāti

synonyms: sārvabhauma kahe—Sārvabhauma said; nīlāmbara cakravartī—the gentleman named Nīlāmbara Cakravartī; viśāradera—of Maheśvara Viśārada (Sārvabhauma's father); samādhyāyī—class friend; ei—this; tāṅra—of him; khyāti—acquaintance.
translation: The Bhaṭṭācārya said, "Nīlāmbara Cakravartī was a classmate of my father, Maheśvara Viśārada. I knew him as such.
